about_the_game:
Who are the omins?

The omins are the tiny inhabitants of the lands of Ominia and belongs to different factions such as humans and orcs. They can either be simple villagers or collect resources as laborers or fight as soldiers. On the other hand, they have desires that need to be satisfied to keep them healthy and happy. When sad, they may refuse to find a partner and can even decide to leave your faction.


Deities and Gardians

The Gardian is a titanic beast which extends your power over the world of Ominia. As long as the Guardian lives, the omins will worship you and you will be able to use a certain number of divine powers permitting, for example, to heal them or unleash firestorms and lightnings on your enemies. But if the Guardian dies, you will be excluded from the world of Ominia and you will lose all your powers over it.


Story mode

The destruction deity Nefasto and his hordes of Gormuns wish to populate the world of only disgusting and stinky creatures. For this reason, they will chase all the omins in order to bring them to extinction. You have been chosen to lead a faction of omins across different lands in search of the powers permitting to defeat Nefasto in a final battle that will decide the fate of all omins.


Key features


  • Two factions of omins: humans and orcs. Other factions will be added soon.
  • Build their villages: omins need houses where to sleep, to hide and to mate with partners.
  • Satisfy their needs: omins need to eat, to rest, to recover when injured.
  • Train their skills: omins can improve their combat, physical and mental skills.
  • Send them to combat: destroy your enemies, conquer other villages and fight for survival.
  • Collect resources: materials for constructions and for crafting, food and so on…
  • Unlock new weapons: use the research tree to unlock and improve new gears.
  • Unleash your powers: spend mana to cast beneficial and destructive divine powers.
  • Explore the world: different habitats with their flora and fauna. Fog of war.
  • Refine your strategy: strategic view that can be simply activated by modifying the zoom..

short_description: Lead your faction of omins in fantastic worlds, build their villages, train their skills, satisfy their needs, and send them to war! Will you save them from the destruction deity Nefasto and his hordes of Gormuns? Play the role of a deity in this real-time strategy inspired by the classic god games.
